Reference for charlieplexed leds

disp1 (bit2 is selector)
   ABCDE_FG
N  00000100
0  11111110
1  01100100
2  11011101
3  11110101
4  01100111
5  10110111
6  10111111
7  11100100
8  11111111
9  11100111

disp2 (bit3 is selector)
   ABCD_EFG
N  00001000
0  11111110
1  01101000
2  11011101
3  11111001
4  01101011
5  10111011
6  10111111
7  11101000
8  11111111
9  11101011
